BR.name: Race To The Line
BR.description: Corre nos famosos em 3D. Vê o que vales, compete contra outros jogadores em pistas alucinantes e em três continentes. Escolhe um dos 10 veículos. Desfruta da vista e passa pelos locais mais famosos da Ásia, Europa e Estados Unidos. Desafia-te com três modos distintos, Challenge (Desafio), Time Attack (Ataque com Tempo Marcado) e Two Players (combates para dois jogadores). Entra em competições nos EUA, Europa e Ásia 8 pistas em todo o mundo 4 tipos de competições / desafios Ganha pontos e desbloqueia novas pistas, carros e pinturas

CA.name: Race To The Line
CA.description: Race in full 3D with famous cars. Test your mettle against other drivers through treacherous tracks across three continents. Choose one of the 10 Vehicles to drive. Take in the sights as you cruise through the famous landmarks in Asia, Europe and the United States. Challenge yourself with three distinct modes, Challenge, Time Attack and Two player battles. Compete in the USA, Europe & Asia 8 tracks around the world 4 types of competitions / challenges Win points to unlock new circuits, cars and paintings

MX.name: Race To The Line
MX.description: Corre en entornos 3D con famosos. Demuestra tu carácter contra otros pilotos a través de circuitos traicioneros en 3 continentes distintos. Ponte al volante de uno de los 10, elige. Disfruta del paisaje a medida que conduces por lugares mundialmente conocidos de Asia, Europa y los Estados Unidos. Supera los retos en tres modos de juego, Desafío, Contrarreloj y Dos jugadores. Compite en Europa, Asia y los EE UU 8 circuitos en todo el mundo 4 tipos de competiciones / desafíos Gana puntos para desbloquear nuevos circuitos, coches y pinturas

US.name: Race To The Line
US.description: Race in full 3D with famous cars. Test your mettle against other drivers through treacherous tracks across three continents. Choose one of the 10 Vehicles to drive. Take in the sights as you cruise through the famous landmarks in Asia, Europe and the United States. Challenge yourself with three distinct modes, Challenge, Time Attack and Two player battles. Compete in the USA, Europe & Asia 8 tracks around the world 4 types of competitions / challenges Win points to unlock new circuits, cars and paintings
